Title: BP start production at Cypre field offshore Trinidad and Tobago
Description: BP Trinidad and Tobago (BPTT) has confirmed the delivery of first gas from its offshore Cypre development, which will help the firm satisfy its existing gas supply commitments.
Author: JS

Title: LNG tanker arrives at UAE shipyard for Gabon FSU conversion
Description: LNG steam tanker LNG Bayelsa has arrived at Port Khalid in the UAE for conversion work into a floating storage unit (FSU) for a proposed 0.7 mtpa Cap Lopez LNG export facility in Gabon.
Author: JS

Title: Broad-ranging US tariffs on imports stir concern among LNG buyers
Description: US President Donald Trumpâ€™s decision to impose a baseline 10% tariff on imports to the United States, effective Apr. 5, to address a persistent trade deficit, has raised concerns among LNG buyers about policy stability and its potential to disrupt long-term investment in US LNG projects.
Author: CK

Title: LNG Canada receives cooldown cargo, paving way for mid-year export start
Description: The Shell-led 14 mtpa LNG Canada project in Kitimat, British Columbia, has received its first LNG cargo to support commissioning ahead of its targeted mid-year start of exports.
Author: CK
